## Bio
Aza is an Machine Learning Engineer with industry experience building LLM agents at Google. He currently works on research problems in the field of mental health & AI. Aza published at major conferences, such as NeurIPS & ICLR.

**Interests:** Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Reinforcement Learning, Meantal Health, Social Impact.
